package training5;

public class Taxi {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		int passengers = 0;
		int[][] path = {
				{0, 1, -1},
				{1, 0, -1},
				{1, 1, 1},
				
		};
		
		for(int i=0; i<path.length; i++) {
			for(int j=0; j<path[i].length; j++) {
				if(path[i][j] != -1) {
					passengers += path[i][j];
				}
			}
		}
		
		System.out.println(passengers);
		
		

	}

}
